Class FontSizeLocator

java.lang.Object
  org.jhotdraw.draw.locator.FontSizeLocator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Locator
public class FontSizeLocator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Locator

FontSizeLocator is used by FontSizeHandle to locate its position on the drawing.
